Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BondListener.BondEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BondListener.BondEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull
    Enclosing interface:
    BondListener
    public static class BondListener.BondEvent
extends Event
implements UsesCustomNull
    Struct passed to BondListener.onEvent(BondEvent) to provide more information about a BleDevice.bond() attempt.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Method Detail

      • device

        public final BleDevice device()
        The BleDevice that attempted to BleDevice.bond().

      • macAddress

        public final java.lang.String macAddress()
        Convience to return the mac address of device().

      • status

        public final BondListener.Status status()
        The BondListener.Status associated with this event.

      • failReason

        public final int failReason()
        If status() is BondListener.Status.FAILED_EVENTUALLY, this integer will be one of the values enumerated in BluetoothDevice that start with UNBOND_REASON such as BleStatuses.UNBOND_REASON_AUTH_FAILED. Otherwise it will be equal to BleStatuses.BOND_FAIL_REASON_NOT_APPLICABLE. See also a publically accessible list in BleStatuses.

      • type

        public final BondListener.BondEvent.Type type()
        Used to indicate whether this BondListener.BondEvent is for bonding, or unbonding.

      • intent

        public final State.ChangeIntent intent()
        Tells whether the bond was created through an explicit call through SweetBlue, or otherwise. If State.ChangeIntent.INTENTIONAL, then BleDevice.bond() (or overloads) were called. If State.ChangeIntent.UNINTENTIONAL, then the bond was created "spontaneously" as far as SweetBlue is concerned, whether through another app, the OS Bluetooth settings, or maybe from a request by the remote BLE device itself.

      • wasSuccess

        public final boolean wasSuccess()
        Shortcut for checking if status() == BondListener.Status.SUCCESS.

      • wasCancelled

        public final boolean wasCancelled()
        Forwards BondListener.Status.wasCancelled().

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

        public final boolean isNull()
        Description copied from interface: UsesCustomNull
        Returns true if the object's state represents what would otherwise be Java's built-in null.
